Reviews.Content: The room is okay, not great, but okay. Would recommend avoiding the restaurant. We were chased by the server after leaving a 12 % tip for so-so service. Yeesh. Welcome to New York.

Reviews.Title: “good hotel”
Reviews.Author: P&DNewt
Reviews.Content: After reading some of the reviews a little aprehensive,but once we got there found our room, agood size,the bathroom was adiquate we only use the room as a base so it suited us.All the staff we delt with were very helpfull and polite.The location is exelent Times Square one way ad reasterants and bars the other way.If go back to New York would stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Outstanding and have recommended it to other travellers”
Reviews.Author: todtod
Reviews.Content: Room clean, tidy, remarkably comfortable with good amenities for a relatively spartan quarter. Motif is perfect ; upscale but familiar with presidential theme. A great experience, priced right, perfect location

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Hotel”
Reviews.Author: lmbinli
Reviews.Content: Location was perfect. The rooms quite large compared to others in New York City.

Reviews.Title: “Worth staying at this butique hotel in NYC”
Reviews.Author: fun777
Reviews.Content: Loved the welcoming atmosphere and chic yet reasonable hotel to stay in nyc. Enjoyed the restaurants options on site and easy to get around the city especially we were in the heart of Theater District right in the Times Square. There are many hotels to choose from in this area but we are glad that we chose to come this hotel and we will definitely come back to the hotel and nyc!

Reviews.Title: “Weekend getaway”
Reviews.Author: krjh92
Reviews.Content: Enjoyed our stay very much! We liked the location very much!

Reviews.Title: “Never slept this well at home!”
Reviews.Author: AngieDawn92
Reviews.Content: Just off Broadway - the location was perfect for us to walk to everything. The funky furnishings and them of the hotel was perfect. The hotel staff couldn't have been more helpful, from remembering our room number when we stopped at the desk with questions, to checking out bags so we could explore the city before retrieving our car. Plus, the beds were a dream, everyone in our group said we slept better than we ever do at home.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic Beds, Cool Lobby Excellent Location”
Reviews.Author: BLUEFLOWERS2005
Reviews.Content: Booked last minute during a busy time and had a great experience, Drove into manahttan ...the hotel was easy to find on the edge of Times Square. The bellman picked up my bags as I parked the car. Check in was quick and they accomodated the early check-in which made my life easier. The room was average size. The hotel looks fairly new. The queen bed was really nice and I slept like a baby. I stayed a few days. Hotel staff very nice. The ticket office for disocunted Broadway Shows at TKTS was around the corner and got 50% off two plays for me and my wife. Lots of shopping in the area . Oh,.. The lobby bar is pretty funky at night had a nice time, I will return The hotel was nicely priced for the quality received and found it to be a very good value.

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable and Great value”
Reviews.Author: dare2burbest
Reviews.Content: I traveled from Australia to USA by myself over the Christmas New Year period 2009/10. I found this hotel very comfortable and staff friendly, although this did change a little as it got closer to Christmas and they became busier. My room was very comfortable and appeared to be newly refurbished. The computers and printers in the business centre were not working and the rooms could have done with a full length mirrow. All and all i was very pleased with this hotel and would definately stay again. However i don't feel it is family friendly. Concerige was always extremely busy and quite stressed and was not overly helpful.

Reviews.Title: “Great price, great location, good room”
Reviews.Author: AnnoyingDad
Reviews.Content: The room was larger than expected, especially at the price we found. We enjoyed the "presidents" theme of the decor (JFK and Jackie art on the wall, George Washington bust lamp), and the bed was comfortable. Bathroom not quite as nice (not much surface area to put stuff, weak water pressure for shower), but not horrible. Some small details amiss: temp knob on heater/AC was broken, sink faucets were labeled "cold" and "cold", etc.) Couldn't get a wi-fi connection in the room; only a minor annoyance on this trip, but it would've been a real problem if I needed to get any work done. Lobby small, but attractive (and wi-fi worked there). Desk staff was friendly and helpful. We didn't eat at the $15 breakfast buffet in the lobby. Close to Broadway theaters and attractions, walking distance to Rockefeller Center, MoMA, and Central Park.

Reviews.Title: “A/C, hot and cold water are not a luxury”
Reviews.Author: rider754
Reviews.Content: First night - no way to adjust temperature of room - like a steam bath - had to sleep naked with no covers in January with the window open - still too hot. Next morning - try to shower - scalding hot - no way to adjust. Demand room change - get a room with temperature control, but no hot water. In 3 days, after 4 attempts to fix, get one shower. Tried to talk to the manager - 4 times - 2 not here - 2 too busy to see me. The building has been partly reno'd, but not the old plumbing. This allows the cold water pressure to dominate the hot, even several rooms away, and it cannot be adjusted properly. I'm a Western Elite points member, with a lot of travel. And they gave me a room they knew was uninhabitable, then switched me to one they knew had no hot water. This hotel does not deserve to wear the brand. The only good things about this hotel is the funky decor, and it's a block from Times Square. It's fine if you don't was, otherwise, stay at your own risk.

Reviews.Title: “small but serviceable room”
Reviews.Author: J_for_Australia
Reviews.Content: small but serviceable room, glad I was on my own. very close to everything so didn't have to travel too far. it was clean, they were doing up the foyer so that was messy but other wise a great place to stay

HotelInfo.Name: Best Western PLUS President Hotel at Times Square
HotelInfo.Address: 234 West 48th Street, Times Square, New York City, NY 10036
